location_id.description: The location identifier where the appointment takes place.

practitioner_id.description: The practitioner identifier who provides the service.

client_id.description: The client identifier who has the appointment.

client_package_id.description: The client package identifier if this appointment uses a package.

case_id.description: The case identifier if this appointment is part of a case.

room_id.description: The room identifier where the appointment takes place.

vehicle_id.description: The vehicle identifier if transportation is involved.

resource_ids.description: The IDs of resources required for this appointment.

cancellation_reason_id.description: The cancellation reason identifier if cancelled.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the appointment was created (ISO 8601).
The timestamp when the availability was created (ISO 8601).

day.description: The day of the week abbreviation.

repeating_end_date.description: The end date for repeating availability (ISO 8601).

start_time_local.description: The start time in local timezone.

start_date_local.description: The start date in local timezone.

local_timezone.description: The local timezone for this slot.

start_datetime_utc.description: The start datetime in UTC timezone (ISO 8601).

sex.description: The client's sex assigned at birth.

privacy_policy_consent.description: The client's privacy policy consent status.

emergency_contact_phone.description: The client's emergency contact phone number.

emergency_contact_relationship.description: The client's relationship to the emergency contact.

notes.description: The client's practitioner or admin notes.

alert.description: The client's alert message for staff.

examples: Referred by GP at City Clinic.

phone_numbers.description: A list of the client's additional phone numbers.

tag_ids.description: The IDs of tags attached to the client.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the client was created (ISO 8601).

phone_numbers.description: A list of the contact's phone numbers.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the contact was created (ISO 8601).

examples: Our primary healthcare facility offering comprehensive services.

online_booking.description: Whether online booking is enabled for this location.

service_ids.description: The IDs of services available at this location.

practitioner_ids.description: The IDs of practitioners working at this location.

opening_hours.description: The location's opening hours for each day of the week.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the location was created (ISO 8601).

online_booking.description: Whether online booking is enabled for this practitioner.

service_ids.description: The IDs of services provided by this practitioner.

location_ids.description: The IDs of locations where this practitioner works.

provider_numbers.description: The practitioner's provider numbers for different locations.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the practitioner was created (ISO 8601).

examples: Comprehensive initial assessment and treatment planning session.

buffer_before_duration.description: The buffer time before the service in minutes.

buffer_after_duration.description: The buffer time after the service in minutes.

online_booking.description: Whether online booking is enabled for this service.

practitioner_ids.description: The IDs of practitioners who can provide this service.

location_ids.description: The IDs of locations where this service is available.

tag_ids.description: The IDs of tags attached to this service.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the service was created (ISO 8601).

errors.description: A detailed description of each field that failed validation.
